pageProduct.name: Skin Doctors Potent Vitamin C Ampoules 50 x 0.3ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Skin Doctors potent Vit. C ampoules instantly boost collagen to dramatically brighten and soften the skin for a clear glowing complexion. 50 ampoules.

Skin Doctors potent Vit. C ampoules are an encapsulated measured single dose ampoule, protected from air and light. Vit. C is the only antioxidant that has been proven to reboot collagen synthesis. It dramatically helps to:


  1. Brighten and soften the skin for a clear glowing complexion

  2. Provide antioxidant protection against ageing free radical damage

  3. Brighten and illuminate fighting against dullness, age spots and discolouration


Recommended for:


  • All skin types

  • Aged skin as treatment

  • Younger skin as preventative


Ingredients

Key Ingredients:
Pure Vitamin C (ascorbic acid) at 10% concentration - Working under the skin at a cellular level, Potent Vit C signals the skin to speed up collagen synthesis and provides deep antioxidant protection and hydration, to help skin look dramatically tighter, firmer, and radiant.
Cyclopentasiloxane - silicone based skin conditioner, locks in moisture.
Dimethicone crosspolymer - silicone based suspending agent. Provides smooth, silky feel and lubricates skin cells.

All Ingredients: Cyclopentasiloxane, Ascorbic acid, Dimethicone crosspolymer, Dimethiconol, dl-alpha-tocopheryl acetate, C12-15 alkyl benzoate, Methyl methacrylate/glycol dimethacrylate crosspolymer, BHT.




Directions

Usage: Face, neck, décolletage. Avoid the under eye area.

Process: After cleansing, use one capsule on a dry face, neck and décolletage every morning. Twist or snip capsule neck to open. Apply by lightly tapping serum onto the skin.

Best results: Use in morning.
Use in conjunction with other Skin Doctors™ treatments and Skin Doctors™ SPF protection during the day.
